tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_date TIMESTAMP,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  finding TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE findings ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    experiment_id INT, 
    finding_description TEXT, 
    finding_date DATE, 
    CONSTRAINT fk_experiment FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments (id) 
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE,
    researcher_id INT,
    experiment_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE findings (
    finding_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    finding_text TEXT,
    finding_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE findings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_id INT,
  observation TEXT,
  result DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(id)
)

CREATE TABLE research_articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  citation_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE research_grants (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_title VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  grant_amount DECIMAL,
  grant_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_date DATE,
  result DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE research_findings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  finding_title VARCHAR(255),
  research_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE experiment_subjects (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  subject_name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE research_methods (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  method_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  author VARCHAR(255)
)
